experience.description: A website for an electronics distribution company in uganda.
A Simple Color Organizer App created with ReactJs, and CSS. It allows a user to organize their colors onto a color pad
A Backend API for a Note Web Application. It provides User Authentication through Web tokens and it allows users to create, View, Edit, favorite and Delete Notes
A full blown web Application Library built with Mongo, Node.js, passport authentication, Goodreads Third-party Api and bootstrap css.
A Front End to the Notedly API Backend. It Consumes the Notedly API.
